views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10

Tired of the oversized date text on your Today View/Notification Center? Reclaim this lost space AND see more of your widgets at the same time!

Switch provided in Settings to enable/disable the tweak. No Date Today is NOT enabled automatically, so make sure to visit Settings after installation and switch it on! Requires a respring to apply changes (respring button provided in settings).

Special thanks to Flex user prouser for the methodology!
